title: 30 Awesome Last-Minute Halloween Costume Ideas
text:
30 Awesome Last-Minute Halloween Costume Ideas Written by: Adam Leverone 10/18/15 - 12:18 PM EDT More Headlines The 10 Best TVs for Under $1,000 
NEW YORK (MainStreet) -- New York Comic Con 2015 has come and gone and with Halloween right around the corner, many are in need of costume ideas. From super heroes, monsters, fantasy heroines and classic figures from literature, there was something for everyone at the annual pop culture convention. Need some inspiration for your Halloween? Here are some last-minute costume ideas from New York Comic Con 2015. From popular Pirates of the Caribbean movies, title character Captain Jack Sparrow
